Languages.string: any languages it knew in life

MonsterTrait.Name: Life Sense
MonsterTrait.Text: The risen reaver automatically detects all living creatures within 120 feet. This sense is blocked by 3 feet of wood, 1 foot of earth or stone, an inch of metal, or a thin sheet of lead.

MonsterTrait.Name: Pounce
MonsterTrait.Text: When the risen reaver hits an enemy with its blade attack after moving at least 20 feet, the target creature must make a DC 15 Strength saving throw. On a failure, the creature falls prone and the risen reaver can use a bonus action to make a single blade attack.

MonsterTrait.Name: Infused Arsenal
MonsterTrait.Text: As a bonus action, the risen reaver can absorb one unattended weapon into its body. For every weapon it absorbs, it deals +1 damage with its blade attacks ( maximum of +3).

MonsterTrait.Name: Skitter
MonsterTrait.Text: The risen reaver can take the Dash action as a bonus action.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The risen reaver makes three blade attacks.

MonsterAction.Name: Blade
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) slashing damage.
